00094 namespace MeCab {
00095 
00096   class die {
00097   public:
00098     die() {}
00099     ~die() { std::cerr << std::endl; exit(-1); }
00100     int operator&(std::ostream&) { return 0; }
00101   };
00102 
00103   class warn {
00104   public:
00105     warn() {}
00106     ~warn() { std::cerr << std::endl; }
00107     int operator&(std::ostream&) { return 0; }
00108   };
00109 
00110   struct whatlog {
00111     std::ostringstream stream_;
00112     std::string str_;     
00113     const char *str() {
00114       str_ = stream_.str();
00115       return str_.c_str();
00116     }
00117     jmp_buf cond_;
00118   };
00119 
00120   class wlog {
00121   public:
00122     whatlog *l_;
00123     explicit wlog(whatlog *l): l_(l) { l_->stream_.clear(); }
00124     ~wlog() { longjmp(l_->cond_, 1); }
00125     int operator&(std::ostream &) { return 0; }
00126   };
00127 }
00128 
00129 #define WHAT what_.stream_
00130 
00131 #define CHECK_RETURN(condition, value) \
00132 if (condition) {} else \
00133   if (setjmp(what_.cond_) == 1) { \
00134     return value;  \
00135   } else \
00136     wlog(&what_) & what_.stream_ << \
00137     __FILE__ << "(" << __LINE__ << ") [" << #condition << "] "
00138 
00139 #define CHECK_0(condition)      CHECK_RETURN(condition, 0)
00140 #define CHECK_FALSE(condition)  CHECK_RETURN(condition, false)
00141 
00142 #define CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(condition) \
00143 if (condition) {} else \
00144   if (setjmp(what_.cond_) == 1) { \
00145     close(); \
00146     return false;  \
00147   } else \
00148     wlog(&what_) & what_.stream_ << \
00149     __FILE__ << "(" << __LINE__ << ") [" << #condition << "] "
00150 
00151 #define CHECK_DIE(condition) \
00152 (condition) ? 0 : die() & std::cerr << __FILE__ << \
00153 "(" << __LINE__ << ") [" << #condition << "] "
00154 
00155 #define CHECK_WARN(condition) \
00156 (condition) ? 0 : warn() & std::cerr << __FILE__ << \
00157 "(" << __LINE__ << ") [" << #condition << "] "
00158 #endif
